be.belgium.eid.security
Interface Verifiable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AuthenticationCertificate, CACertificate, Certificate, HardCodedRootCertificate, RNCertificate, RootCertificate, SignatureCertificate
public interface Verifiable

The verifiable interface can be implemented by any object that can be verified by itself or any other object.

Version:
1.0.0 12 Feb 2008
Author:
Kristof Overdulve

Method Summary
 boolean verify()
          Verifies the certificate and stores the results in the status.
 

Method Detail

verify

boolean verify()
               throws java.security.cert.CertificateException,
                      java.io.IOException
Verifies the certificate and stores the results in the status.

Returns:
whether the verification succeeded
Throws:
java.io.IOException - when the certificate couldn't be parsed because the file system is read only
java.security.cert.CertificateException - when the instance couldn't be parsed
